alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Horry County through 215 PM EDT... At 138 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Sea, or 13 miles southeast of Mullins, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bayboro and Green Sea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
